page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT IN NEWRY CTD.
page.content: The "Newpoint Players"have performed since 1940 except for a lapse of 10 years from 1960-1970.They perform plays from every age and also many modern plays by Irish writers. Newry Musical Feis or festival was founded in 1929.The first feis lasted only 3 days but over the years it has grown into 3 weeks.The most recent additions are classes for the handicapped,harp competitions and band competitions.The number of competitors has been increasing for the last 10 years but now it has stablized to 6000 plus.
